::: {#hero-heading style="text-align:left"}
I am a research scientist with a background in Biomedical Engineering. My primary interests include the following:

• Data Analysis and Visualization

• Synthetic Biology

• Machine Learning for Health

This blog aims to promote data-driven decision-making and introduce readers to data analysis and visualization basics. Additionally, I will provide a periodic summary of recent advances in Synthetic Biology and Machine Learning for Health.
:::
